value.stringValue: O processo da conta {!myVariable_current.Name} foi finalizado.

CASE( LEN(
SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE([Account].Documento__c , "/", ""), ".", "" ), "-", "" )), 14, 'J - Juridica', 11, 'F - Fisica', 'Desconhecido' )

formulas.name: formula_9_myRule_8_A1_1049277735
formulas.expression:
CASE( LEN(
SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!myVariable_current.Documento__c} , "/", ""), ".", "" ), "-", "" )), 14, 'J - Juridica', 11, 'F - Fisica', 'Desconhecido' )

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Account].SituacaSimplesNacional__c ), ISCHANGED([Account].RegimeTributacao__c ) ), OR( UPPER([Account].RegimeTributacao__c) = 'SIMPLES NACIONAL', UPPER(LEFT([Account].SituacaSimplesNacional__c , 20)) = 'OPTANTE PELO SIMPLES' ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_14
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SituacaSimplesNacional__c} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.RegimeTributacao__c} ) ), OR( UPPER({!myVariable_current.RegimeTributacao__c}) = 'SIMPLES NACIONAL', UPPER(LEFT({!myVariable_current.SituacaSimplesNacional__c} , 20)) = 'OPTANTE PELO SIMPLES' ) )
